data.title: A GREAT DAY IN HIP HOP REVISITED
data.meta_description: A look back at a historic day in music history, September 29, 1998, when Gordon Parks gathered over 200 hip hop artists to recreate the famed “A Great Day
data.text:
A look back at a historic day in music history, September 29, 1998, when Gordon Parks gathered over 200 hip hop artists to recreate the famed “A Great Day in Harlem” image.

Director: Nelson George

Producer: Butch Robinson, Nelson George, Malika Weeden

Writer: Nelson George

Cinematographer: Henry Adebonojo, Maurice Marable, Marcus Turner, Nelson George, and Butch Robinson

Editor: Malika Weeden

Country: USA

Year: 2019

View All Shorts in this Program »
